product.title: Mens Casual Premium Slim Fit T-Shirts
product.description: Slim-fitting style, contrast raglan long sleeve, three-button henley placket, light weight & soft fabric for breathable and comfortable wearing. And Solid stitched shirts with round neck made for durability and a great fit for casual fashion wear and diehard baseball fans. The Henley style round neckline includes a three-button placket.

product.title: EA SPORTS FC 24 - PlayStation 5
product.description: EA SPORTS FC 24 is a new era for The World’s Game: 19,000+ fully licensed players, 700+ teams, and 30+ leagues playing together in the most authentic football experience ever created. Feel closer to the game with three cutting-edge technologies powering unparalleled realism in every match.

product.title: Lenovo IdeaPad Gaming 3 15ACH6 Laptop

product.title: Philips Deep Fryer
product.description: Great Tasting Fries With Up To 90Percent Less Fat Philips Brings The World'S No.1 Airfryer To Everyone'S Home. Enjoy Healthy Food That'S Crispy On The Outside And Tender On The Inside, Thanks To Rapid Air Technology. Download The Nutriu App To Discover Hundreds Of Tasty Recipes Every Day - International warranty

product.title: Kindle Paperwhite (16GB)
product.description: Kindle Paperwhite is thin, lightweight, and travels easily so you can enjoy your favorite books at any time. With our signature 300 ppi glare-free Paperwhite display—now 10% brighter at its max setting—you can read in any light. A single battery charge via USB-C lasts up to 10 weeks. Battery life may vary depending on use.

product.title: Samsung Galaxy A14 LTE, 64GB Storage, 4GB RAM,
product.description: Your Galaxy A14 smoothes things out when you're short-handed while multi-tasking, providing you with that extra room needed.*4/6GB memory models will support up to 4/6GB of internal storage that can be used as virtual memory to improve app performance.**Memory options and availability may vary by country, region or carrier. Available memory capacity is subject to preloaded system
